si.title: එක් වෙඩි තැබීමක මරණය
body_lines: අද (21) පෙරවරුවේ එක් අයෙකු මියගොස් තිබේ.
යතුරුපැදියක ගමන් කරමින් සිටි වලස්කාලාහි වසර 48 ක දුරක්, වෙඩි තබා dead ාතනය කර ඇති අතර එම ස්ථානයේදීම මිය ගියේය.

en.title: Death in one of the shootings
body_lines: One person was killed in a shooting incident this morning (21) near the Veterinary Doctors Office in Dickwella - Valaskala.
A 48 -year -old man from Valaskala, who was traveling on a motorcycle, was shot dead and died on the spot.

summary_lines: Shooting in Dickwella: 48-year-old motorcyclist killed near Veterinary Doctors Office. Incident occurred on 21st. Victim died instantly.
